index.title: Automate your courier service and help!
index.subtitle: With apomap automate, you can define your internal courier service processes and then forget about them!

connect.title: Connect interface
connect.subtitle: With one step, you can connect your POS system to apomap and automatically import orders

define.title: Define processes
define.subtitle: You can digitally define your internal courier service processes in apomap intuitively. With the command interface, the drag-and-drop interface, and keyboard commands, it goes really fast

automate.title: Perform deliveries
automate.subtitle: Your defined processes are now running automatically and you can deliver packages to your courier with the apomap driver app

command.placeholder: ⌘K - Type what you want to do!

codeConfirmation.title: We have sent a code to your email {{email}}. Please enter it in the field below and confirm.
